About

I am a cybersecurity engineer who enjoys building lean, automatable defenses. I believe security engineering must be measurable, approachable, and aligned with real operational risk—not fear. Outside of securing systems, I’m currently completing a 48‑state roadtrip documenting energy efficiency, weather impact, and journey analytics.

I value high-signal processes, clear service boundaries, and investing in tooling that shrinks mean-time-to-detect and mean-time-to-remediate. I learn by shipping.

When not working or driving, I capture photography, refine the telemetry platform, and write about practical security approaches that balance constraints with resilience.

Built with Astro & Tailwind. Free & maintenance-light.
